PERSONA.NAME: King of France
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Almost dies until Helen brings a remedy.

PERSONA.NAME: Bertram
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Count of Rossillion, he flees to Florence.

PERSONA.NAME: Parolles
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A parasitical follower of Bertram, he betrays everyone at some point.

PERSONA.NAME: First French Lord
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The brothers Dumaine in the Florentine service

PERSONA.NAME: Second French Lord
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The brothers Dumaine in the Florentine service

PERSONA.NAME: Rinaldo
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A steward and servant to the Countess of Rossillion

PERSONA.NAME: Helena
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A gentlewoman protected by the Countess of Rossillion

PERSONA.NAME: Old Widow of Florence
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A Capilet of Florence who helps Helena.

PERSONA.NAME: Violenta
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Neighbor and friend to the widow

PERSONA.NAME: Mariana
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Neighbor and friend to the widow and Diana
